```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(gt)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)
```

Här är den aktuella poängställningen efter den första av fem deltävlingar:

```{r data_prep, include=FALSE}
# Import result dataset from first competition
comp1 <- read_excel(here("assets","data", "Result_no1.xlsx"))
View(comp1)

## Calculate points per competition

# Add new variable "points"
tot <- comp1 %>% mutate(Points = case_when(
  Place == 1 ~ 25,
  Place == 2 ~ 22,
  Place == 3 ~ 19,
  Place == 4 ~ 17,
  Place == 5 ~ 15,
  Place == 6 ~ 13,
  Place == 7 ~ 12,
  Place == 8 ~ 11,
  Place == 9 ~ 10,
  Place == 10 ~ 9,
  Place == 11 ~ 8,
  Place == 12 ~ 7,
  Place == 13 ~ 6,
  Place == 14 ~ 5,
  Place == 15 ~ 4,
  Place == 16 ~ 3,
  Place == 17 ~ 2,
  TRUE ~ 1
))
View(tot)
```

```{r result_table, echo=FALSE}
result1 <- tot %>% 
  select(Name, Points) %>% 
  rename(Namn = Name, Poäng = Points)

# Create tabel output using kableExtra package
kable(result1) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left")
  
```
